General.Name: Audio Pixels Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Audio Pixels Holdings Limited, through its subsidiary, Audio Pixels Limited, engages in the development of digital speakers in Australia and Israel. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

2.Name: Mr. Ian Alistair Dennis ACA, B.A, B.A., C.A.
2.Title: Company Sec. & Non-Exec. Director

3.Name: Mr. Daniel  Lewin
3.Title: CEO & Director of Audio Pixels Limited
